title: eBay seller: JKAYMAC - SGC T206 Tolstoi Cards & Lenox Marquard – closing Wed., Aug 22
author: bdecsports

posts.post_title: eBay seller: JKAYMAC - SGC T206 Tolstoi Cards & Lenox Marquard – closing Wed., Aug 22
posts.post_content:
Hi,

We are currently auctioning on eBay the last installment of the T206 Tolstoi tobacco baseball cards from our “Minnesota Find”, each graded by SGC, and the find also included a T206 Marquard w/ a Lenox Back as well. We also have 1914 T213 SGC graded cards of WaJo & Matty, etc. The auctions are listed under eBay seller JKAYMAC, and the auctions will be closing Wednesday, Aug. 22nd, starting at 10:00pm est.

[url]https://www.ebay.com/sch/m.html?_ssn..._ipg=200&rt=nc[/url]

We are always Buying & Selling vintage sports cards & memorabilia, and as always, we will offer a discount on any of our "Fixed" price eBay listings with a direct deal. Our next show is the Philly show, Sept. 21-23, exhibiting at booth #102 (left side of the front entrance), and we hope to see you there.

Regards,
Bryan Dec

810-664-1790
This guy is the best and a great friend of mine.  Bryan is in Florida we do not get to have our 1 a month lunch. Good man Bryan miss my Michigan brother
probably should list this in the proper section though.

[quote name="823dek" post=1804560]what section?...Barbies and Kens ?[/QUOTE]

The eBay and other auction BST announcements, and it looks like you did post there as well. This section is to buy, sell and trade directly on this forum.

[quote name="823dek" post=1804560]what section?...Barbies and Kens ?[/QUOTE]

Don't be a dick :).  Bryan, who is a good hobby friend, posted this in the wrong section. It should go where the other guys said...There is a section down below here that says Ebay and other Venues, that is where it goes...and is moved to. thanks...
Also your link in't working, just brings me to a generic ebay page.
